Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nifty \nifty\ adj. 1. Very good; excellent; -- an informal term meaning about the same as {groovy}, sense 1. [informal, 1960's]
Syn: bang-up, bully, cool, corking, cracking, dandy, great, groovy, keen, neat, not bad(predicate), peachy, slap-up, swell, smashing. [WordNet 1.5]
2. Stylish; attractive; -- of clothing; as, a nifty outfit. [PJC]

nifty adj : very good; "he did a bully job"; "a neat sports car"; "had a great time at the party"; "you look simply smashing" [syn: {bang-up}, {bully}, {corking}, {cracking}, {dandy}, {great}, {groovy}, {keen}, {neat}, {not bad(p)}, {peachy}, {slap-up}, {swell}, {smashing}] [also: {niftiest}, {niftier}]
